MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Shieldhall. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:32pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of difficulties locating the cause of the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:45pm on Saturday, 24th April 2021.
